amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to improving Medicaid based on successful and bipartisan State demonstration projects.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 539 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 539 proposed by Senator Cassidy. (consideration: CR S1882-1883; text: CR S1882) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to improving Medicaid based on successful and bipartisan State demonstration projects.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 539 proposed by Senator Cassidy.
